title: WHIRLING F1 / SMOKER ON THE BALCONY
description: Smoker on the balcony, sitting in the bar.

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hi again, gendarme.""

links.title: You: ""What are you doing here?""
links.text: "What are you doing here?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Admiring the atmosphere..." He smi..."
links.text: "Admiring the atmosphere..." He smiles. "What about you, officer?"

links.title: You: ""I live here, my room is right upst..."
links.text: "I live here, my room is right upstairs."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Convenient," he nods. "But what ar..."
links.text: "Convenient," he nods. "But what are you doing *here*, talking to me?"

links.title: You: ""I'm here to drink myself into obli..."
links.text: "I'm here to drink myself into oblivion."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""A bit too dramatic, don't you thin..."
links.text: "A bit too dramatic, don't you think?" He says it like it's an aesthetic question. "If you really must do it then I'd go with something else... some other substance."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""But then again -- you're a cop, it..."
links.text: "But then again -- you're a cop, it definitely fits the genre." He looks at his hands folded on a table. "*I* fit the genre, we all do... moulded by fiction like we're characters in some bad novella."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Human psychology is definitely laz..."
links.text: "Human psychology is definitely lazy, don't you think?"

links.title: You: ""This is where I'm going to go down..."
links.text: "This is where I'm going to go down in history: I'm going to sing karaoke."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Really?" He straightens up, curiou..."
links.text: "Really?" He straightens up, curious. "Well, I look forward to that!" He raises a glass to you.

links.title: You: ""I'm here to kick some ass and solv..."
links.text: "I'm here to kick some ass and solve the case I'm working on."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Well, here's to you!" He raises a..."
links.text: "Well, here's to you!" He raises a glass, before taking a sip of his drink, froth grazing his mouth.

links.title: You: ""I don't know what I'm doing here...."
links.text: "I don't know what I'm doing here. I just go wherever life takes me."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hmm... maybe you should figure it..."
links.text: "Hmm... maybe you should figure it out, detective."

links.title: You: ""Tell me again about that *muscular..."
links.text: "Tell me again about that *muscular type* who came to investigate the crime."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, yes... let's see. He knocked o..."
links.text: "Oh, yes... let's see. He knocked on my door a few days after the lynching. I think he was going through the entire building, asking questions."

links.title: You: ""What did you tell him?""
links.text: "What did you tell him?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Nothing. That I didn't see anythin..."
links.text: "Nothing. That I didn't see anything."

links.title: You: ""And he believed you?""
links.text: "And he believed you?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Why shouldn't he?""
links.text: "Why shouldn't he?"

links.title: You: ""Did you tell him about your friend?""
links.text: "Did you tell him about your friend?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He takes another drag of his cigare..."
links.text: He takes another drag of his cigarette before knitting his brows. "What friend?"

links.title: You: ""Your Sunday friend, the witness.""
links.text: "Your Sunday friend, the witness."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No, I don't think it came up.""
links.text: "No, I don't think it came up."

links.title: You: ""What did he look like?""
links.text: "What did he look like?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Muscular. Handsome." He shrugs non..."
links.text: "Muscular. Handsome." He shrugs nonchalantly. "Strong. Like one of those military types."

links.title: You: ""Was he alone?""
links.text: "Was he alone?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yes, but he was speaking to someon..."
links.text: "Yes, but he was speaking to someone on his earpiece."

links.title: You: ""His earpiece?""
links.text: "His earpiece?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yes, you know those tiny speaker-m..."
links.text: "Yes, you know those tiny speaker-microphones that fancy security guards sometimes wear."

links.title: You: ""What was he saying?""
links.text: "What was he saying?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Just reporting back whatever I was..."
links.text: "Just reporting back whatever I was telling him."

links.title: You: ""Besides *muscular*, did he have an..."
links.text: "Besides *muscular*, did he have any other identifying traits?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, let me think..." He turns his..."
links.text: "Oh, let me think..." He turns his eyes upward in recollection. "He had an accent. He sounded like one of those mercenaries."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""He sounded vaguely Oranjese." He c..."
links.text: "He sounded vaguely Oranjese." He closes his eyes. "No, not vaguely, scratch that. He sounded *definitely* Oranjese."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for the information.""
links.text: "Thanks for the information."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Sure. Anything else on your mind?"..."
links.text: "Sure. Anything else on your mind?" His lazy eyes stroll over your face.

links.title: You: ""I need to talk with your Sunday fr..."
links.text: "I need to talk with your Sunday friend again, it's about committee business."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, a *committee*." He smiles. "Ho..."
links.text: "Oh, a *committee*." He smiles. "How interesting..."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""There's only one problem: I don't..."
links.text: "There's only one problem: I don't think he wants to talk with *you*."

links.title: Volition: "There's only one way through this...."
links.text: There's only one way through this. You're going to have to apologise...

links.title: Volition: "Fortunately, saying sorry is practi..."
links.text: Fortunately, saying sorry is practically second-nature for you.

links.title: Authority: "Never. You're no sorry cop. *He* sh..."
links.text: Never. You're no sorry cop. *He* should apologise to *you*.

links.title: You: ""Maybe you could intercede on my be..."
links.text: "Maybe you could intercede on my behalf?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No." He exhales a grey trail of sm..."
links.text: "No." He exhales a grey trail of smoke. "I don't think I will. This is between the two of you, you see."

links.title: You: ""Then I guess I should apologise fo..."
links.text: "Then I guess I should apologise for that little *misunderstanding* in the apartments."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yes." He nods. "I think that would..."
links.text: "Yes." He nods. "I think that would be prudent..."

links.title: You: ""You can tell him I'm prepared to a..."
links.text: "You can tell him I'm prepared to accept his apology anytime."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: "A bemused expression. "Oh, I don't..."
links.text: A bemused expression. "Oh, I don't think *you* should be expecting an apology from *him*."

links.title: Authority: "Then you have nothing more to say h..."
links.text: Then you have nothing more to say here.

links.title: Empathy: "Don't be foolish. There's greater t..."
links.text: Don't be foolish. There's greater things at stake here than your pride.

links.title: You: ""Okay, fine. *I'm* the one who shou..."
links.text: "Okay, fine. *I'm* the one who should apologise."

links.title: You: ""Then he and I have nothing more to..."
links.text: "Then he and I have nothing more to discuss."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, he'll be *devastated* to hear..."
links.text: "Oh, he'll be *devastated* to hear that, I'm sure..." He smiles.

links.title: Drama: "He doesn't care one way or another...."
links.text: He doesn't care one way or another. For him, it's all one entertaining chamber play.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What, you're going to blow a lead,..."
links.text: "What, you're going to blow a lead, just like that?" The lieutenant gives you an incredulous look.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I'm not sure if you've noticed, bu..."
links.text: "I'm not sure if you've noticed, but Martinaise isn't exactly crawling with Coalition representatives. You're going to have to look for someone else now."

links.title: Empathy: "What are you doing, Harry? You bett..."
links.text: What are you doing, Harry? You better hope there's someone else around who can help you get in touch with the Coalition...

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""In any event, good luck with whate..."
links.text: "In any event, good luck with whatever it is you're up to."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""And if I may ask, gendarme, what i..."
links.text: "And if I may ask, gendarme, what is this *committee* about?" He takes a measured drag of his cigarette.

links.title: Rhetoric: "He's all bemused skepticism. He doe..."
links.text: He's all bemused skepticism. He doesn't *actually* care what you want with his friend.

links.title: You: ""I'm not really sure, I'm just tryi..."
links.text: "I'm not really sure, I'm just trying to reach a higher authority."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Sounds like a bore, frankly." He t..."
links.text: "Sounds like a bore, frankly." He takes a drag of his cigarette. "All the fun stuff's down here..."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""In any case, I would *love* to hel..."
links.text: "In any case, I would *love* to help, but the thing is, I don't know *where* he is. We don't talk about everything, you see..." He gently taps the end of his cigarette with his forefinger.

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""He might have mentioned something..."
links.text: "He might have mentioned something about making a tour of some historical sites up the coast... in an unofficial capacity, of course."

links.title: You: ""Do you know when he'll be back?""
links.text: "Do you know when he'll be back?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Not a clue. I'm not his agenda kee..."
links.text: "Not a clue. I'm not his agenda keeper, you see."

links.title: You: ""I guess I'll have to look for him..."
links.text: "I guess I'll have to look for him along the coast."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I guess you will." He tips his hea..."
links.text: "I guess you will." He tips his head ever so slightly toward you.

links.title: You: ""How did he get over the water lock..."
links.text: "How did he get over the water lock? I thought it was impassable?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He shrugs. "He has his ways. I don'..."
links.text: He shrugs. "He has his ways. I don't need to know every detail of his life."

links.title: You: ""It's about assigning la responsabi..."
links.text: "It's about assigning la responsabilit√©."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""God, of *course* it is. My friend..."
links.text: "God, of *course* it is. My friend is always trying to convince me I need a little more responsibility..."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""As though I don't have enough goin..."
links.text: "As though I don't have enough going on already."

links.title: You: ""I'm really not at liberty to say.""
links.text: "I'm really not at liberty to say."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, a big *secret* committee. I un..."
links.text: "Oh, a big *secret* committee. I understand perfectly..." His mouth forms a half smile.

links.title: You: ""I met your Sunday friend.""
links.text: "I met your Sunday friend."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""You did?" A small smile adorns his..."
links.text: "You did?" A small smile adorns his face. "And how did you like him?"

links.title: You: ""You were right, he was magical. Ma..."
links.text: "You were right, he was magical. Magically bureaucratic."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I told you, he can be very useful...."
links.text: "I told you, he can be very useful. I guess that's the charm of powerful people."

links.title: You: ""Who is he?""
links.text: "Who is he?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""A visitor from the first world. He..."
links.text: "A visitor from the first world. He's not like you and me, gendarme." He smiles and his smile seems melancholic. "He can always return."

links.title: You: ""Return where?""
links.text: "Return where?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""To his opportunities in Occident,..."
links.text: "To his opportunities in Occident, Sur-la-Clef. Still..." He breathes in and keeps his lungs filled for a moment, before letting it out. "His coming and going brings some life to the village."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Or is it just money, I don't know...."
links.text: "Or is it just money, I don't know..." He stares at the bar.

links.title: You: ""What are you, you two?""
links.text: "What are you, you two?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Friends, I told you. Sunday friend..."
links.text: "Friends, I told you. Sunday friends. Friends who like to get together from time to time."

links.title: You: ""What does it mean -- a Sunday frie..."
links.text: "What does it mean -- a Sunday friend?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: "He sighs: "That he won't be there w..."
links.text: He sighs: "That he won't be there when times get tough, I guess."

links.title: You: ""Is that even a friend?""
links.text: "Is that even a friend?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""It is -- on Sundays." He smiles."
links.text: "It is -- on Sundays." He smiles.

links.title: You: ""Why was he staying at your place i..."
links.text: "Why was he staying at your place in the middle of night?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""He has keys. And he likes the view..."
links.text: "He has keys. And he likes the view..." He waves gently with his cigarette-holding hand. "To the sea, I mean."

links.title: You: ""I don't want to talk about other p..."
links.text: "I don't want to talk about other people, I want to talk about you."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hmm?" He hums. "What about me, gen..."
links.text: "Hmm?" He hums. "What about me, gendarme?"

links.title: You: ""I didn't like him as much as I lik..."
links.text: "I didn't like him as much as I like you."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Aw, shoot." He bursts out laughing..."
links.text: "Aw, shoot." He bursts out laughing. "Why not?"

links.title: You: ""I didn't. He's a government offici..."
links.text: "I didn't. He's a government official. I don't trust governments."

links.title: You: "What is it about the way he carries..."
links.text: What is it about the way he carries himself?

links.title: Composure: "Could he be... a member of the *hom..."
links.text: Could he be... a member of the *homo-sexual underground*?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Yes, this man is definitely one of..."
links.text: Yes, this man is definitely one of the homos, I've seen them homos with my own eyes.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "This *sexual* thing seems interesti..."
links.text: This *sexual* thing seems interesting... Ask around, become involved.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Just pointing it out, we're not tal..."
links.text: Just pointing it out, we're not talking about some kind of a cult with *members* here, you made it up.

links.title: You: ""Are you... are you part of the *ho..."
links.text: "Are you... are you part of the *homo-sexual underground*?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""The *homo-sexual underground*?" Th..."
links.text: "The *homo-sexual underground*?" The smoker sits up immediately, his eyes wide with amused surprise; a honeyed smile lingers on his lips.

links.title: Drama: "He's assuming a role to mock you --..."
links.text: He's assuming a role to mock you -- or to entertain himself with your ignorance. Don't fall for it!

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Why yes I am, officer. Why, do you..."
links.text: "Why yes I am, officer. Why, do you want to *investigate*?"

links.title: You: ""Yes, I want to hear more about thi..."
links.text: "Yes, I want to hear more about this *homo-sexual underground* you're part of."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh, it's a *pleasure* group... a s..."
links.text: "Oh, it's a *pleasure* group... a sub-rosa pleasure group congregating in cellars under the cover of night... Saturday night, sometimes even *Friday* night!"

links.title: You: ""What about Thursday night?""
links.text: "What about Thursday night?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Or Thursday night! Sometimes the c..."
links.text: "Or Thursday night! Sometimes the congregating doesn't even end, it carries on into our daily life..." He lowers his voice conspiratorially and looks around.

links.title: You: ""But why do you convene, what do yo..."
links.text: "But why do you convene, what do you *do*?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Oh we're ambitious, we want to des..."
links.text: "Oh we're ambitious, we want to destroy the last vestiges of meaning, the last things people in Revachol have to hold on to, the true symbols of security -- the meaning of man and woman, mother and father, their marriage."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""*Everything* will be constantly sh..."
links.text: "*Everything* will be constantly shifting and moving under our rule, the future will belong to a circus of identities, just spinning around, surreal and unreal... You won't even know who you are anymore."

links.title: You: ""But I like knowing who I am.""
links.text: "But I like knowing who I am."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""But do you also like the *razzle-d..."
links.text: "But do you also like the *razzle-dazzle* of gold? Do you like parties and discos and having fun under the vibrant lights of Saturday night?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Because instead of the traditional..."
links.text: "Because instead of the traditional family unit we're going to have all this *razzamatazz*," he wiggles his hands, "and mysteries, of course, too -- mysteries of *sexual* nature, very esoteric. And disco music and drugs."

links.title: You: ""I do like disco, maybe I should ge..."
links.text: "I do like disco, maybe I should get into it?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""You can't just get into it, you ha..."
links.text: "You can't just get into it, you have to be born into it -- one is either already *in* the homo-sexual movement or forever excluded from it."

links.title: You: ""What if I can't remember whether I..."
links.text: "What if I can't remember whether I'm in or not? What if I can't remember anything about my life -- aside from the fact that I like disco?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Beautiful!" The smoker crawls up t..."
links.text: "Beautiful!" The smoker crawls up to you like an animal preparing to jump. "Beautiful, that's exactly what we're looking for! Who knows, maybe you *were* homo-sexual in the past, maybe all of that has been *repressed*..." He circles his hands around you.

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I have to say that you do look lik..."
links.text: "I have to say that you do look like someone who might be part of *the underground*. You have that very distinctive 'I-can't-understand-what's-going-on-here' look."

links.title: You: ""Okay..." (Blink.) "Okay, I have to..."
links.text: "Okay..." (Blink.) "Okay, I have to think about it."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Do think about it, officer." He st..."
links.text: "Do think about it, officer." He starts laughing and leans back against the counter.

links.title: You: ""This is gonna be, like, a twenty h..."
links.text: "This is gonna be, like, a twenty hour mind-project for me. Twenty hours at least."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Absolutely *wonderful*.""
links.text: "Absolutely *wonderful*."

links.title: Conceptualization: "A man like you can figure out his s..."
links.text: A man like you can figure out his sexuality in a working day. It won't be twenty hours unless you want to enter the heightened realms of the *fantasme √©rotique* afterwards. Then it may be twenty hours *or more*! But that would be on your own time.

links.title: You: ""Okay, then I'm definitely not in.""
links.text: "Okay, then I'm definitely not in."

links.title: You: ""No, this is not me.""
links.text: "No, this is not me."

links.title: You: ""That much fun should be illegal.""
links.text: "That much fun should be illegal."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Ah... But for the better part of h..."
links.text: "Ah... But for the better part of history it *has been* illegal."

links.title: You: ""But it isn't anymore?""
links.text: "But it isn't anymore?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""No." He studies you from across th..."
links.text: "No." He studies you from across the table.

links.title: You: ""Does it have anything to do with d..."
links.text: "Does it have anything to do with disco?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Yes, we listen to a lot of disco...."
links.text: "Yes, we listen to a lot of disco. Some say we *engineered* disco to spread our vision of a vertiginous, ever-changing society, where all there is a razzle-dazzle of gold!"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""We are going to *change* the famil..."
links.text: "We are going to *change* the family unit with all this razzamatazz and finger-dancing," he wiggles his hands, "and with mysteries, of course, the mysteries are also of sexual nature, very esoteric."

links.title: You: ""Other questions, I had other quest..."
links.text: "Other questions, I had other questions, really!" (Try to back off.)

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: "The smoker starts laughing and lean..."
links.text: The smoker starts laughing and leans back against the counter: "Sure thing, officer, what do you want to know next?"

links.title: You: ""No, I just wanted to know whether..."
links.text: "No, I just wanted to know whether you were one of them."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Well, I *am* one of them, one of t..."
links.text: "Well, I *am* one of them, one of this *sub-rosa pleasure group* congregating in cellars under the cover of night... Saturday night, sometimes even *Friday* night!"

links.title: You: ""Let's just not talk about this any..."
links.text: "Let's just not talk about this anymore."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Why not? Don't you want to hear ab..."
links.text: "Why not? Don't you want to hear about how we want to destroy the last vestiges of meaning, the last things people in Revachol have to hold on to, the meaning of man and woman?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Or the true symbols of security, m..."
links.text: "Or the true symbols of security, mother and father and their everlasting marriage... *Everything* will be constantly shifting and moving under our rule, the future will belong to a *circus* of identities, just spinning around, surreal and unreal..."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""You won't even know who you are an..."
links.text: "You won't even know who you are anymore."

links.title: You: "I'm not bringing it up -- let it go..."
links.text: I'm not bringing it up -- let it go.

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hmm?" he hums honeyed."
links.text: "Hmm?" he hums honeyed.

links.title: Composure: "It's the sports, he's a sports guy,..."
links.text: It's the sports, he's a sports guy, all about that physical prowess and athletic skill... Nothing else here.

links.title: You: ""About this hat I'm wearing...""
links.text: "About this hat I'm wearing..."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""You can keep it, I don't mind. I c..."
links.text: "You can keep it, I don't mind. I can appreciate beauty when I see it."

links.title: You: ""I wasn't really planning on giving..."
links.text: "I wasn't really planning on giving it back anyway."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""How cunning." He raises his brows..."
links.text: "How cunning." He raises his brows and you're not sure whether he's mocking you or not. "I like men who take what they want."

links.title: You: ""Thanks. It's like carrying a piece..."
links.text: "Thanks. It's like carrying a piece of you with me at all times."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Is it now?" He starts laughing. "W..."
links.text: "Is it now?" He starts laughing. "Well, enjoy it."

links.title: You: ""I took it to blend in. I'm underco..."
links.text: "I took it to blend in. I'm undercover, you see?"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Blend in where?" He raises his bro..."
links.text: "Blend in where?" He raises his brows. "A carneval?"

links.title: You: ""About this robe I'm wearing...""
links.text: "About this robe I'm wearing..."

links.title: You: ""About the hat and the robe I'm wea..."
links.text: "About the hat and the robe I'm wearing..."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Bye-bye, gendarme.""
links.text: "Bye-bye, gendarme."

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I see you've found yourself a litt..."
dialogueTree.text: "I see you've found yourself a little something from my wardrobe." He scans you. "Not bad, not bad at all. What brings you here?"

dialogueTree.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hi, gendarme. Another rendezvous."..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hi, gendarme. Another rendezvous." There he is again -- the smoker on the balcony! Right here in the Whirling-in-Rags.

links.title: You: ""Hi.""
links.text: "Hi."

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hi-hi. So what brings you here?""
links.text: "Hi-hi. So what brings you here?"

links.title: You: ""Hello." (Adjust your tie.)"
links.text: "Hello." (Adjust your tie.)

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""Hello-hello. So what brings you he..."
links.text: "Hello-hello. So what brings you here?"

links.title: You: ""Hello.""
links.text: "Hello."

links.title: You: ""You're here!""
links.text: "You're here!"

links.title: Smoker on the Balcony: ""I am. So are you. What brings you..."
links.text: "I am. So are you. What brings you here?"

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
